import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import css from './Profile.module.css'; export default function Profile({ name,tag,location, avatar,followers,views,likes }) { return (

{name}

{tag}

{location}

  • Followers {followers}
  • Views {views}
  • Likes {likes}
)}; Profile.propTypes = { name: PropTypes.string, tag: PropTypes.string, location: PropTypes.string, avatar: PropTypes.string, folowers: PropTypes.number, views: PropTypes.number, likes: PropTypes.number, }
